definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hurl, shoot (NH id.; Ar. t.ah.ay spread, extend, carry far with, e.g. a ball Lane:1832c)—only

definitions.title: Pil.
definitions.body: Pt. (Ges:§ 75 R 18) pl. cstr. [[הַרְחֵק כִּמְטַחֲוֵי קֶשֶׁת]] Ge 21:16 (E), lit. making distant like shooters of a bow = about a bowshot off.
